name: Undead Zulus
description:
Undead Zulus DLC.

A Standalone DLC From the Witch House Trials #witchhousetrials Undead Zulus is a immersive first person wave based survival simulator featuring many undead zulus.

In a small town some where in south africa a zombie pandemic has broken out and turned all the locals into blood thirsty zombies, you must use your wits and survival techniques to survive for as long as possible.
